IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: MPP FOUNDATION ENVISIONS A NATION WHERE: 1) MARIJUANA IS LEGALLY REGULATED SIMILARLY TO ALCOHOL, 2) MARIJUANA EDUCATION IS HONEST AND REALISTIC, AND 3) TREATMENT FOR PROBLEM MARIJUANA USERS IS NON-COERCIVE AND GEARED TOWARD REDUCING HARM.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO DISTRIBUTE EDUCATIONAL INFORMATION TO THE PUBLIC ABOUT MARIJUANA BY INCREASING, INDENTIFYING, AND ACTIVATING SUPPORTERS OF NON-PUNITIVE, NON-COERCIVE MARIJUANA POLICIES.
IRS990.Desc: COALITION ENGAGEMENT & PUBLIC EDUCATION: MPPF WORKED IN VARIOUS STATES TO INCREASE PUBLIC SUPPORT FOR NON-PUNITIVE, NON-COERCIVE MARIJUANA POLICIES, INCLUDING MT, SD, AL, CT, DE, HI, LA, MD, SC, VA AND OTHERS. MPP FOUNDATION ALSO ENGAGED IN A RANGE OF ACTIVITIES TO BUILD SUPPORT FOR MPPF'S MISSION AMONG THE PUBLIC, INCLUDING PRESENCE AT EVENTS, PROVIDING INFORMATION ONLINE THROUGH ITS WEBSITE, EMAIL, SOCIAL MEDIA, AND OTHER ONLINE ENGAGEMENT CHANNELS, AND PRODUCING COLLATERAL.

Form990ScheduleAPartVIGrp.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE A, PART II, LINE 10, EXPLANATION OF OTHER INCOME:

OtherAssetsOrgGrp.Desc: DUE TO MPP, A RELATED ORGANIZATION

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION BELIEVES THAT IT HAS APPROPRIATE SUPPORT FOR ANY TAX POSITIONS TAKEN, AND AS SUCH, DO NOT HAVE ANY UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS THAT ARE MATERIAL TO THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS OR THAT WOULD HAVE AN EFFECT ON ITS TAX-EXEMPT STATUS. THERE ARE NO UNRECOGNIZED TAX BENEFITS OR LIABILITIES THAT NEED TO BE RECORDED.

RecipientTable.PurposeOfGrantTxt: GENERAL RESEARCH ON LEGALIZATION OF MARIJUANA

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: GRANTS ARE GIVEN THEIR OWN CLASS AND MONEY SPENT ON EACH PROJECT IS TRACKED TROUGH THE EXPENSE MANAGEMENT SYSTEM. MINIMIAL MONITORING IS REQUIRED.

THE ORGANIZATION'S OFFICERS ARE PAID BY MARIJUANA POLICY PROJECT, A RELATED ORGANIZATION. THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS APPROVES THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTORS COMPENSATION WHEN THEY APPROVE THE BUDGET EACH YEAR. THE OTHER OFFICER'S SALARIES ARE APPROVED BY THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR EACH YEAR.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE 990 IS REVIEWED BY THE CHIEF OF STAFF AND THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR PRIOR TO FILING. A COPY IS ALSO PROVIDED TO THE BOARD MEMBERS AND ALL OTHERS UPON REQUEST.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: MPP FOUNDATION'S DOCUMENTS ARE MAINTAINED IN THE ORGANIZATION'S HEADQUARTERS IN THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA. THE MPP FOUNDATION STAFF MAILS THE DOCUMENTS TO INTERESTED PERSONS, UPON REQUEST, VIA THE U.S. POSTAL SERVICE. IN ADDITION, MPP FOUNDATION POSTS ITS FORM 990 ON THE ORGANIZATION'S WEBSITE. FINALLY, MPP FOUNDATION ALSO POSTS ITS ANNUAL REPORT ON THE ORGANIZATION'S WEBSITE.
